ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/9/99 4:02:26 PM Eastern Daylight Time, wizard@...
writes:

> Im looking for mobs wich drop a 24 lv runes i have pased all mistmore lake
> and graveyard but i dont find ONE ..rune anyone know what mobs drop runes
> easy and wich zone i will go there at last to buy some?

Most any zone. you have mostly had horrible luck. Aviaks (south Karana)
seem to have many spell components...

You need to find monsters that are 24-30 to get the 24 level runes.

Sonoroud Tomebinder.
